mapper.update: update inquiry set viewcount = viewcount+1 where num= #{num}

mapper.insert: insert into reply(rno, num, replytext) values (rno_seq.NEXTVAL,#{num},#{replytext})
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM reply r, inquiry m WHERE r.num = m.num AND m.num=#{num} ORDER BY rno
